timeline.bodyHTML:
The field inverterConfig can be null at this point. To mitigate this, you can store the field to a local variable before checking it:


Future<?> localInverterConfig = inverterConfig;
if (localInverterConfig != null) {
    localInverterConfig .cancel(true);
}

Then, you can remove the supression.
